abstract: A split between retail banking and investment services would improve stability, the Independent Commission on Banking concludes.
snippet: A split between retail banking and investment services would improve stability, the Independent Commission on Banking concludes.

headline.main: British Panel Urges Sweeping Banking Overhaul

abstract: William T. Winters, a former co-head of JPMorgan Chase’s investment bank, and Martin Taylor, a former chief executive of Barclays, said they had “no sympathy” for bankers arguing that the new rules would damage Britain’s economy and banking sector.
snippet: William T. Winters, a former co-head of JPMorgan Chase’s investment bank, and Martin Taylor, a former chief executive of Barclays, said they had “no sympathy” for bankers arguing that the new rules would damage Britain’s economy and banking sector...
lead_paragraph: Two former bankers defended the new industry changes proposed on Monday by a British panel, lashing out against one-time colleagues.

headline.main: Two Former Bankers Defend British Reform Plan
